ussr.physics.jme.connectors
Class JMEBasicConnector

java.lang.Object
  ussr.physics.jme.connectors.JMEBasicConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
JMEConnector, PhysicsConnector, PhysicsEntity, PhysicsObserver
Direct Known Subclasses:
JMEMechanicalConnector
public abstract class JMEBasicConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements JMEConnector, PhysicsObserver

Abstract class providing basic connector functionality

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI
